ComicInfo.Penciller: Charles Nicholas,Steve Ditko,Wayne Howard,Steve Ditko,Charles Nicholas,Wayne Howard
ComicInfo.Summary:
*Overview* Three Beastly Tales - Countess Von Bludd introduces this issue's stories.The Unicorn! - A couple hunt for the mythical Unicorn, but find this creature to be no easy prey. Main Attraction - The owner of a failing circus seeks an out-of-this world creature to attract customers. Vampire with a Whip - Countess Von Bludd puts on a show so she can entrance and feed off her audience.
The Man Who Died Twice - An African slave is sentenced to death, but the power of voodoo gives him the chance to avenge himself.
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/scary-tales-11-three-beastly-tales-the-unicorn-mai/4000-221352/
ComicInfo.Title: The Unicorn!; Main Attraction; Vampire with a Whip
